name: Snodgrass, Robert
description: Withdrawn on 40 minutes in the clash with QPR on 16/8.  Steve Bruce revealed on 20/8 Snodgrass could be out for up to six months with a dislocated kneecap.

name: Ramsey, Aaron
description: Withdrawn at half-time during 9/12 game against Galatasaray. Ramsey sat out of the Emirates meeting with Newcastle on 13/12 with Wenger also ruling him out of the trip to Liverpool on 21/12.

name: Taylor, Matty
description: Missed 13/9 game against Crystal Palace with problem. Underwent surgery on 16/10 and will be out for foreseeable future.

name: di Maria, Angel
description: Sustained in the 3-0 win over Hull on 29/11 which saw him forced off on 14 minutes. Louis van Gaal stated post match that he would miss the home clash with Stoke on 2/12 because it was "too close".

name: Kompany, Vincent
description: Sustained in the encounter with Leicester on 13/12 which saw him forced off on 75 minutes.

name: Nani
description: Joined Sporting Lisbon on season-long loan deal

name: Mirallas, Kevin
description: Sustained in the 3-1 win over QPR on 15/12 which saw him stretchered from the field on 75 minutes. Roberto Martinez described the injury as "bad" post-match and confirmed that the player would undergo

name: Smalling, Chris
description: Forced off early during 8/12 game against Southampton.

name: Fellaini, Marouane
description: Ruled out of 20/12 game against Aston Villa due to problem.

name: Sidwell, Steve
description: Sustained in the 1-0 defeat at Liverpool on 29/11 which saw him forced off on 22 minutes.

name: Tiote, Cheick
description: Missed the Capital One Cup tie with Tottenham on 17/12.

name: Hernandez, Javier
description: Joined Real Madrid in season-long loan deal.

name: Blind, Daley
description: Forced off during Holland's win over Latvia on 16/11. Louis van Gaal confirmed on 20/11 the midfielder could be sidelined for up to six months.

name: Yanga-Mbiwa, Mapou
description: Joined Roma on season-long loan deal.

name: Cisse, Papiss
description: Missed the Capital One Cup tie with Tottenham on 17/12 due to illness.

name: Osman, Leon
description: Rated a doubt for 20/12 trip to Southampton.

name: Bent, Darren
description: Moved to Brighton on one-month loan on 26/11

name: Balotelli, Mario
description: Handed one-match ban for recent social media post. Will miss 20/12 clash with Arsenal before returning for 26/12 trip to Burnley.

name: Jovetic, Stevan
description: Missed the trip to Leicester on 13/12 with a minor muscle injury.

name: van Ginkel, Marco
description: Joined AC Milan on season-long loan

name: Ameobi, Sammy
description: Missed 17/12 cup trip to Tottenham.

name: Krul, Tim
description: Picked up problem in training ahead of 29/11 game against West Ham. Ruled out "for the next four or five games" by Alan Pardew on 29/11.

name: Walcott, Theo
description: Arsene Wenger revealed on 21/11 he "doesn't think" Walcott will be available for following day's clash with Man United.

name: Zaha, Wilfried
description: Withdrawn on 60 minutes of the 1-1 draw with Stoke on 13/12 with a knock.

name: Taylor, Steven
description: Missed 17/12 cup defeat at Spurs with problem but has since returned to training.

name: Davis, Steven
description: Missed 16/12 cup clash with Sheffield United due to problem.

name: Cork, Jack
description: Forced off early during 3/12 game against Arsenal.

name: Cleverley, Tom
description: Suspened for one match after picking up his fifth booking of the season in the encounter with West Brom on 13/12. He will miss the clash with Man United on 20/12 to return to contention on 26/12 again

name: Krkic, Bojan
description: Withdrawn on 54 minutes of the 1-1 draw with Crystal Palace on 13/12 with a knock to his hip which was restricting his movement and influence on the game.

name: Ince, Tom
description: Joined Nottingham Forest on a two-month loan on 30/10.

name: Shaw, Luke
description: Sustained against Arsenal on 22/11 which saw him forced off on 16 minutes. Ruled out "for a few weeks" on 28/11.

name: Mariappa, Adrian
description: Missed 23/11 clash with Liverpool after sustaining injury in training the previous day.

name: Oxlade-Chamberlain, Alex
description: Struggling with a groin problem which restricted his movement at the end of the 4-1 win over Newcastle on 13/12.

name: Schneiderlin, Morgan
description: Set to serve one-match ban for earning a fifth yellow card of the season during 16/12 cup clash with Shefffield United. Will miss 20/12 game against Everton before returning for 26/12 trip to Crystal

name: Olsson, Jonas
description: Expected to return in mid January after undergoing surgery.

name: Ozil, Mesut
description: Reports on 8/10 suggest he could be sidelined for 10-12 weeks.

name: Luna, Antonio
description: Joined Verona on season-long loan deal.

name: Gibson, Darron
description: Withdrew from Republic of Ireland squad on 15/11 due to problem.

name: Sturridge, Daniel
description: Set for scans after sustaining problem during training on 18/11. Club confirmed the following day he is set for another period on the sidelines.

name: Figueroa, Maynor
description: Joined Wigan Athletic on a month-long loan on 21/10.

name: Diame, Mohamed
description: Forced off during 3/12 clash with Everton due to recurrence of previous injury. Confirmed on 13/12 that Diame had been put in a brace for at least a month.

name: Wilshere, Jack
description: Sustained in the encounter with Man United on 22/11 which saw him forced off on 55 minutes. Ruled out for three months on 27/11 after undergoing surgery.

name: Santon, Davide
description: Expected to be sidelined until November, Alan Pardew has revealed.

name: Pelle, Graziano
description: Rated a doubt for 20/12 game against Everton with minor problem.

name: Lovren, Dejan
description: Forced off during 17/12 cup clash with Bournemouth.

name: Monreal, Nacho
description: Ruled out of 6/12 trip to Stoke.

name: Koscielny, Laurent
description: Missed the Emirates meeting with Newcastle on 13/12 with Wenger also ruling him out of the trip to Liverpool on 21/12.

name: Cole, Joe
description: Sustained in the 1-0 win at Crystal Palace on 2/12 which saw him replaced on 9 minutes.

name: Drogba, Didier
description: Sustained in the Capital One Cup tie with Derby County on 16/12 which saw him forced off on 63 minutes.

name: Arteta, Mikel
description: Withdrawn during 26/11 game against Borussia Dortmund with problem. Post-match, Arsene Wenger admitted the injury "looked quite serious".

name: Rodriguez, Jay
description: Sustained in the 4-1 defeat to Man City on 5/4 which saw him stretchered off in the first half. Club confirmed on 7/4 he is expected to be sidelined for around six months.

name: Anichebe, Victor
description: Replaced during 6/12 game against Hull due to problem.

name: Upson, Matthew
description: Nigel Pearson revealed on 12/8 the defender is set to undergo surgery and will be out "for a while".

name: Odemwingie, Peter
description: Forced off during 30/8 game against Man City. Ruled out for the "foreseeable future" on 1/9.

name: Huddlestone, Tom
description: Serving a four-match ban. Huddlestone earned a one-match ban after collecting his fifth yellow card of the season during the 13/12 game against Chelsea. He then received an additional three-match ban

name: Caulker, Steven
description: Missed 15/12 trip to Everton with problem.

name: Rosicky, Tomas
description: Rated a doubt for 6/12 trip to Stoke.

name: Johnson, Glen
description: Sustained in the encounter with Man United on 14/12 which saw him forced off on 24 minutes.

name: Aguero, Sergio
description: Sustained in the encounter with Everton on 6/12 which saw him forced off on 7 minutes. Ruled out for 4-6 weeks by Manuel Pellegrini on 9/12.

name: Noble, Mark
description: Rated a doubt for 2/12 trip to West Brom by Sam Allardyce.

name: Rojo, Marcos
description: Missed the encounter with Liverpool on 14/12 with an injury sustained in training.

name: Richardson, Kieran
description: Serving a three-match ban for the red card received at West Brom on 13/12 for serious foul play. He will miss matches against Man United, Swansea and Sunderland to return to contention on 1/1 against

name: Wanyama, Victor
description: Set to serve one-match ban for earning a fifth yellow card of the season during 16/12 cup clash with Shefffield United. Will miss 20/12 game against Everton before returning for 26/12 trip to Crystal

name: Boruc, Artur
description: Joined Bournemouth on loan from 19/9 until January.

name: Flanagan, Jon
description: Sent home from club's summer tour of US with problem. Ruled out "for a number of months" on 18/9 after undergoing surgery.

name: Negredo, Alvaro
description: Joined Valencia on season-long loan deal

name: Chamakh, Marouane
description: Sustained in the encounter with Stoke on 13/12 which saw him forced off on 75 minutes.

name: Courtois, Thibaut
description: Ruled out of 13/12 game against Hull by Jose Mourinho.

name: Tadic, Dusan
description: Ruled out of 20/12 game against Everton with minor problem.

name: Westwood, Ashley
description: Stretchered off in the encounter with Leicester City on 7/12.

name: Gardos, Florin
description: Set to serve a one-match ban after being sent off for denying a goal scoring opportunity in the 16/12 cup clash with Sheffield United. Will miss the 20/12 games against Everton before returning for 26

name: Ledley, Joe
description: Faces a fitness test ahead of 20/12 trip to Man City due to ongoing problem.

name: Ireland, Stephen
description: Rated a doubt for 22/12 visit of Chelsea.

name: Dzeko, Edin
description: Sustained a recurrence of his previous calf injury in the warm-up to the encounter with Leicester on 13/12.

name: Isla, Mauricio
description: Harry Redknapp revealed on 19/12 the player has returned to Chile as his partner is due to give birth.

name: Sandro
description: Sustained in the 1-0 defeat to Newcastle on 22/11. Ruled out until after Christmas on 25/11.

name: Murray, Glenn
description: Joined Reading on loan until January

name: de Jong, Siem
description: Club confirmed on 5/9 he is expected to be out for a number of months.

name: Senderos, Philippe
description: Picked up problem during training for Swiss national side on 11/11 and will miss the upcoming clash with Lithuania and Poland.

name: Samaras, Georgios
description: Ruled out of 20/12 game against QPR. Returned to training on 18/12 after being granted a week off for personal reasons.

name: McCarthy, James
description: Forced off during 27/11 Europa League game against Wolfsburg due to problem.

name: Jones, Billy
description: Limped out of practice match ahead of 18/10 game against Southampton.

name: Dawson, Michael
description: Sustained in the encounter with Chelsea on 13/12 which saw him forced off on ten minutes.

name: Kozak, Libor
description: Ruled out for rest of the season by club on 2/1. Reported in March that he should return to contention for Villa's pre-season in July.
